info.name: Tomcat Detection
author: philippedelteil
dhiyaneshdk
info.description: If an Tomcat instance is deployed on the target URL, when we send a request for a non existent resource we receive a Tomcat error page with version.

curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/35.0.2117.157 Safari/537.36' 'http://bodgeit.demo-targets.svc.cluster.local:8080'

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: bodgeit.demo-targets.svc.cluster.local:8080' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_9_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/35.0.1916.47 Safari/537.36' 'http://bodgeit.demo-targets.svc.cluster.local:8080/'
